name: cphreccl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3
body: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), c2))

stmt.origin: cphreccllem(c1, c2, c3, c2, wcel(c0, ccph))
stmt.pretty: cphreccllem(c1, c2, c3, c2, c0 ∈ CPreHil)

body.origin:
|- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c1, c2), wne(c1, nat0)), wcel(co(nat1, cdiv, c1), c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wceq(c3, co(ccnfld, cress, c2)))
-| wi(wcel(c0, ccph), wcel(c3, cdr))
body.pretty:
⊢ ((c0 ∈ CPreHil ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c1 ≠ 0)→(1[÷]c1)∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c3 =(CCfld[|`s]c2))
⊣ (c0 ∈ CPreHil → c3 ∈ DivRing)

comment: The scalar field of a subcomplex pre-Hilbert space is closed under reciprocal. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Oct-2015.)
